subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Tomas Vokoun stopped 31 shots and three Penguins scored in a seven-minute stretch to help Pittsburgh shut down the Islanders and take a 3-2 lead in their playoff series.
snippet: Tomas Vokoun stopped 31 shots and three Penguins scored in a seven-minute stretch to help Pittsburgh shut down the Islanders and take a 3-2 lead in their playoff series.
